description: Source code for the Intro page component of a LightningJS-based quiz application. Contains template, state, components, and initialization code for the intro screen with title, subtitle, buttons, and tip message.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: Base class for creating LightningJS components, extended here to define the Intro page.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Defines the component's reactive state, including layout parameters and displayed texts.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Registers child components used within this component.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Lifecycle method called when the component is mounted; sets up button event handlers.
